sentence: Last year, Thiel gave $10m each to the campaigns of two protégés – Blake Masters, who is running for the Senate from Arizona, and JD Vance, from Ohio.
author: Robert Reich
title: Beware of this deadly mix: oligarchic economics and racist, nationalist populism

title: The real reason why the GOP loves Putin

sentence: A slightly slicker but similarly disturbing message is evident in a recent campaign ad by Peter Thiel-backed GOP candidate for Arizona's Senate seat, Blake Masters.

title: Rick Scott's agenda underscores the love fest between the GOP and Vladimir Putin
